      • createTableDownloadDocumentWriter

        protected de.esoco.data.document.TabularDocumentWriter<byte[]> createTableDownloadDocumentWriter()
        Subclasses that want to provide a download option from UI tables must implement this method to return an implementation of TabularDocumentWriter that processes table data for download. The default implementation throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
        Returns:
        An tabular document writer instance

      • getDataElementFactory

        protected final DataElementFactory getDataElementFactory()
        Returns the data element factory of this service.
        Returns:
        The data element factory
